Subskills.name: Volatile Magic
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius of corpse explosion.

Subskills.name: Violent Burst
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Convergence
Subskills.description: Corpse explosion now inflicts poisoned and poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Channeling Necromancy
Subskills.description: Increases maximum cast range of corpse explosion.

Subskills.name: Reaching Conduit
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of corpse explosion.

Subskills.name: Homunculus
Subskills.description: Corpses spawned from meat bomb causes corpse explosions to deal additional damage.

Subskills.name: Reaper Within
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by corpse explosion.

Subskills.name: Rush from the Harvest
Subskills.description: Exploding a corpse gives you a burst of movement speed.

Subskills.name: Lich's Command
Subskills.description: Corpses are now lit on fire with increased size, dealing increased damage and inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Unfair Advantage
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned enemies.

Subskills.name: Assured Passing
Subskills.description: Corpses have a chance to explode twice.

Subskills.name: Dissolvant Solution
Subskills.description: Corpse explosion deals poison damage inflicting poison break and dissolves low life monsters into gas clouds.

Subskills.name: Devouring Aura
Subskills.description: Activate an aura around you consuming nearby corpses per second casting corpse explosion for a short period. Corpse explosion now has a cooldown.
